headline: How Recent Core Banking Expectations Are Shifting The Story For Jack Henry (JKHY)
summary: The fair value estimate for Jack Henry & Associates has been updated from US$196.36 to US$202.67 per share, reflecting refreshed assumptions around revenue growth and the size of the potential core banking win opportunity highlighted in recent research. Analysts pointing to scenarios of up to 130 incremental core wins and an associated US$80 million revenue and US$0.50 earnings per share opportunity have prompted modestly higher long term revenue expectations in valuation models. Continue...
